FROM php:7.4-apache-buster
RUN apt update && apt -y --no-install-recommends install zip unzip git-all && rm -rf /var/lib/apt/lists/*;
COPY --from=composer:2 /usr/bin/composer /usr/bin/composer

COPY . .

RUN composer update
